title: Rav Fruchthandler Calls for Fair Pay
body: Rav Avrohom Fruchthandler, president of Yeshivas Rabbeinu Chaim Berlin, urged the Torah world to value and compensate mechanchim fairly at a Torah Umesorah meeting, citing his own rabbeim's high salaries as a model.

title: Rav Fruchthandler Calls for Fair Pay
body: Rav Avrohom Fruchthandler, president of Yeshivas Rabbeinu Chaim Berlin, delivered a passionate appeal for fair pay for mechanchim at a Torah Umesorah meeting, highlighting the need for change in how the Torah world values and compensates its educators.
